description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, and we're adding the "Kiss Game" mini-game!
Stranded survivors tremble in fear of werewolves at the snowy mountain lodge.
In the midst of this, the "Purple Butterfly" Lilian stands tall!
Werewolves sneakily attack people at night because they're cowards.
If you're not a werewolf, prove it by playing the chocolate bar game with me and showing you're not afraid!
name: Additional mini-game "Kiss Game"
